entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then light snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
